Interface MessageSerializer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseSerializer, DataSerializer, FixedSchemaDataSerializer, FixedSchemaKeyedDataSerializer, KeyedDataSerializer

    public interface MessageSerializer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ChannelMessage build(java.lang.Object message, java.lang.Object partialBuildObject)
      This method will be called repeatedly until the message is fully built
      void init(Config cfg, java.util.Queue<DataBuffer> sendBuffs)
      Initialize the serializer, it should use the sendBuffs queue to pick a network buffer

      • build

        ChannelMessage build(java.lang.Object message,
                     java.lang.Object partialBuildObject)
        This method will be called repeatedly until the message is fully built
        Parameters:

        partialBuildObject - the out message to serialize

        a channel message
